ResearchProjectDef.label: basic implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft specialised implants built for specific purposes.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->survived a vicious nuclear winter only due to their implanted internal climate control
subject_story->was chased off by a squad of ancient soldiers who woke much faster than expected, due to their cryptowake implants
subject_story->fought alongside a rebel cyborg who picked up an entire hover-fighter

ResearchProjectDef.label: sanguophage implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft and install bionic organs that can boost a sanguophage's unnatural traits.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was known for ripping out the throats of any who displeased them with their fangs
subject_story->was kidnapped and forced to work in a jet black secret lab
subject_story->wanted to help those with incurable blood diseases

ResearchProjectDef.label: extra limbs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use nerve-gel split-links to install and install an extra pair of artificial limbs. Archotech arms are always perfectly controllable but human-made limbs require some adjustment time.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->meditated with the 4 armed monks of Lutuni
subject_story->barely escaped, as a deformed super-soldier with 4 power claws tore through their lab staff
subject_story->was saved from certain death by a legendary 4 armed surgeon who could perform faster than any unaugmented doctor
